statementlist.statement: select id, school_id, title, author, isbn, publisher, remarks, subject_id, price from book
insert into book (school_id, title, author, isbn, publisher, remarks, subject_id, price) values (:school_id, :title, :author, :isbn, :publisher, :remarks, :subject_id, :price)
delete from borrows where book_copy_id in (select id from book_copy where book_id = :book_id)

select book.id as id, title, author, publisher, remarks, isbn, price, subject.shortname as subject_name, subject.id as subject_id, book_form.id as book_form_id, form.id as form_id, form.abbreviation as form_name, curriculum.id as curriculum_id, curriculum.abbreviation as curriculum_name, languageyear from book left join book_form on book_form.book_id = book.id left join value as form on form.id = book_form.form_id left join value as curriculum on curriculum.id = book_form.curriculum_id left join subject on subject.id = book.subject_id where book.school_id = :school_id
select school_id from book where id = :book_id
